directions: Combine with the chopped onions, eggs, flour, chopped parsley, salt and pepper.
Heat up a frying pan with 1 tbsp olive oil.
Add a quarter of the ingredients. Spread to form a pancake about 4” round.
Cook over a medium heat for a few minutes till brown.
Flip the pancake over. Cook till brown.
Repeat the same procedure for the other pancakes.
title: Potato Pancakes
